translation: Yylhi (sạry) āsmạnụ̄kurh phttn.
Th pnnis rb sndi ṭrfh dnh āmut (phttnuk) ḥukm aann bja th (yohe ḥkmuk tʿmyl) chuh ts layq.
Th yylhi zmyn (ryzh ryzh krith) phhlavnh yiyhi.
Th yikynczhah tath mnz chuh so chhakhi tath nybr th gczihh khạly.
Th (sothi) aanhi pnnis rb sund ṭrfh dnh āmut (chak gczhnuk) ḥukm bja th (yhe aṭaʿt) chhe ts layq.
Ae ansan! Cz chuhkh pnnis rbs tam vatns mnz skht mshqth vytravan ạkhr kar chuhe cze tsụ̄ smkhun.
Lhādha ys shkhṣh sund aʿmal namh tmụ̄ sndis dchihnis aaths mnz dinh yiyhi.
Tylhi yiyhi ʿnqryb ts shl ḥsab hynh.
Th suh phyri pnnyn bạczn kun khvsh th shadman vaps.
Th albth suh shkhṣ yymụ̄ sund aʿmal namh tmụ̄ sndi shanh ptụ̄ kinụ̄ dinh yiyhi.
Tylhi layhi suh ʿnqryb mvts nad.
Th suh gczihh jhnm kis nars mnz dạkhl yath lmbkh āsn vothan.
Be shk avs suh (dnyahs mnz) pnnyn bạczn mnz khosh th shadman rvzan.
Be shk avs tmụ̄ yhi gman kormut zi suh gczihh nh ḥsab khạṭr (Allah tʿālyā hs nishhi) hrgz vaps.
Kyazi nh!be shk chuh tmụ̄ sund rb ts var pạtthụ̄ vuchhn vvl.
Lhādha chuh me qsm shfquk (yʿny sham kh vozjaruk nath aamhi pth kh gashuk)
Byyhi rạcz hund th timn chyzn hund yimn so (pnnis damns mnz) vttan chhe.
Byyhi zvunhi hund yylhi so pvur chhe aathhi yivan.
Tohụ̄ gczihv ṭbq dr ṭbq ẓrvr svạrụ̄ kran kran.
Tylhi kya chuh yimn gomut zi (qrāny pyshyn gvʿy hnz ṣdaqt vuchihth thi) chihnh ayman aananin.
Th yylhi yimn pytth qrān chuh prnh yivan tylhi chihnh (Allah tʿālyā snzi bargahi mnz) sjdh kran.
Blkh chih kạfr lukh (aath mzyd) ankar kran.
Th Allah tʿālyā chuh (kfrvʿdavt kis tath samans) var pạtthụ̄ zanan yus tim sombravan chih.
Lhādha diyivtohụ̄ timn dg tulvnhi ʿdhabch bshart.
Mgr yimav lukv ayman aon byyhi chih nyk ʿml kran tihindi khạṭr chuh nah czhynn vvl (pvshvun) thvab.
